judges: Before Stearns, Jones, Chidsey, Musmanno and Arnold, JJ.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
The definitive decree of distribution is affirmed on the adjudication and opinion of President Judge Boyle, at the cost of appellant.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Robert W. McWhinney, with him McWhinney & McWhinney, for appellant.
C. Elmer Brown, with Mm Charles P. Pearson, for appellees.

Elmore Estate.

November 8, 1954:
C. Elmer Brown, with Mm Charles P. Pearson, for appellees.
